name: ShapeVS (itch)
description:
ShapeVS is a 4 player-local mini fast-paced, competition-heavy multiplayer game wrapped in a sinister program. Battle it out across various aptitude tests (mini-games) designed by Dr. Reginald Pierce of ShapeTECH.

Break the mold and help the minds at ShapeTECH "shape" the newest members of society. Through vigorous testing prove your worth amongst your friends, family members and more and show that YOU deserve your place in the new society.

  • Local Multiplayer Frenzy: Battle it out in various different games that focus on different play styles, controls, and rules that you must overcome to win.
  • Eye on the Prize! Only those with the drive, the power and the hunger to take victory shall be granted entry. Show off how good you are through taunts and other options. Make your opponents know who they’re up against.
  • Power Ups Galore! The power to help or hinder is in your hands, each game comes with various power-ups that change the game.
  • More to Come: We're a small team but we are aiming to expand the world of ShapeVS with new games, customisation options and a single-player experience focused around the world of ShapeTECH and its illustrious leader, Dr Reginald Pierce.

ShapeVS is also available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1575750/ShapeVS/

Due to being a small dev team the paid version of ShapeVS will be updated more frequently but the Itch version does offer a pay-what-you-want option. Thank you for supporting us in this venture.

To keep up to date please follow us on any of our socials.

FOR ANY ISSUES AND BUGS PLEASE CONTACT US HERE: https://smashattackaus.com/contact-us
